name: PiRATS
description:
An epic journey across the ocean shore floor.

You take control of Ratniss, a pirate rat looking to find where the ocean has disappeared to. Travel east across the brutal wasteland to find a hidden temple.

However, someone may beat you to the spoils. Pick up your hat, down the rest of your rum, its gonna be one hell of a journey.

Submission for MiniJam 28: Pirates (no water) – 72 hours to make a game from scratch!

Controls
WASD = Movement
Mouse = Aim

Credits
Code: Emma
Art/Animation: Fmlad
Sound Effects: Fmlad, using rFXGen v2.0

"Call to Adventure" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
